name: SRE.ai
headline: Automated DevOps for Low-Code Platforms
description: SRE.ai provides AI Agents to power Low-Code DevOps for Low-Code Platforms like Salesforce, SAP, NetSuite, etc.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:b2b; industry:devops; industry:infrastructure; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

raw_markdown='# AI DevOps Agents‍for Enterprise Teams
Unprecedented automation and speed for any development process
[Request access](https://sre.ai/<https:/cal.com/sreai>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/672ca8143fd753d3e21884b9_Ellipse%203.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/672ca859d375c73882bea550_Ellipse%208.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/673036047f36d1b750281dc6_sreai%20full%20logo%20white%20\(2\).svg)](https://sre.ai/<#>)
[hide](https://sre.ai/<#>)[Request Access](https://sre.ai/<https:/cal.com/sreai>)
[Request access](https://sre.ai/<https:/cal.com/sreai>)
Built by engineers from leading AI institutions with backing from the top investors 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/67345f2cda94732f00b69f56_Group_1000003259.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/67345f2cd0538dcb2f29cab2_Group_1000003258.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/67345ec58de5bc7d2a9d1bd2_Group_1000003257.svg)
## The most advanced natural language DevOps platform
Collaborate smarter and deliver faster by augmenting your team with AI agents that can be tailored to any workflow.
### Take advantage of fast deployments and back-promotions
Kick-off deployments to any number of environments with just a chat message or a click of a button. You can deploy between environments ad-hoc or by pre-configuring pipelines with strict promotion rules and access controls.
### Resolve errors at any layer, and prevent future ones
Ensure faster, safer releases by identifying and resolving merge, dependency, and integration conflicts early in your development cycle. Our agents are constantly learning and can auto-resolve issues based on historical context.
### Gain release insights in advance with simulations and impact reports
Effortlessly spin up and seed ephemeral environments to verify release behavior. You can define acceptance criteria, mirror production traffic with edge-case and performance tests, and generate change analyses.
### Drive truly-holistic automation with deep integrations across your entire stack
Connect your existing communication, ticketing, and version control tools. Our out-of-the-box integrations with common tools enable you to take advantage of our agents without disrupting your current development process.
### Protect against data loss with seamless backups and disaster recovery
Be prepared for rainy day scenarios with customizable backup schedules and recovery plans. Alternatively, take advantage of our default configurations based on industry best practices.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/67319d54c034f24469261e4c_Ellipse%2041.svg)
## Frequently Asked Questions
How do we get started?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/673180ad63c551ccda87bac2_Vector%2047%20\(1\).svg)
Start by clicking the "Request Access" button to book a demo.
Can we really trust AI agents to accomplish tasks?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/673180ad63c551ccda87bac2_Vector%2047%20\(1\).svg)
Yes. Our agents are evaluated for quality and have safeguards to prevent hallucination. You can also configure workflow steps to have a human-in-the-loop.
What platforms do you currently support?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/673180ad63c551ccda87bac2_Vector%2047%20\(1\).svg)
We are currently building for the Salesforce ecosystem.
What is the inspiration behind your name?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d14bf912cb9ef1ebeabe13/673180ad63c551ccda87bac2_Vector%2047%20\(1\).svg)
"SRE" stands for "Site Reliability Engineering." You can read more about it at https://sre.google.

generated_description:
**SRE.ai: Automated DevOps for the Low-Code Era**

Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, SRE.ai is breaking new ground in the intersection of artificial intelligence and DevOps. As part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, the company aims to automate the development operations for low-code platforms such as Salesforce, SAP, and NetSuite. With a mission to streamline the development process, SRE.ai is building a robust framework powered by AI agents, offering unprecedented automation and speed to enterprise teams.

### The Offering

SRE.ai’s platform enables development teams to collaborate more efficiently, utilizing AI agents that can adapt to various workflows. Here’s how they are making waves:

1. **Rapid Deployments:** With just a chat message or a button click, users can deploy applications across multiple environments, configured with strict promotion rules and access controls.

2. **Error Resolution:** By identifying and resolving integration conflicts early in the development cycle, SRE.ai's AI agents learn from historical data to tackle issues that may arise, ensuring safer and quicker releases.

3. **Release Insights:** Teams can create ephemeral environments for testing prior to full deployments, allowing them to mirror production traffic and perform edge-case and performance tests effectively—ensuring a smoother integration process.

4. **Automation Across the Stack:** With easy integration into existing tools like communication platforms and version control systems, SRE.ai enhances automation without the friction of changing current workflows.

5. **Data Protection:** Their platform offers seamless backup and disaster recovery options, ensuring businesses are prepared for unexpected scenarios, utilizing industry best practices.

### Team and Leadership

Though the company is just starting out, it’s led by experienced engineers from renowned AI institutions, and is backed by top-tier investors. Notably, Diana Hu serves as the Group Partner supporting SRE.ai's journey.

### Getting Started

For businesses interested in transforming their development operations, SRE.ai invites potential users to request access through their website at [sre.ai](https://sre.ai). They assure users that their AI agents are reliable, vetted for quality, and can operate with a "human-in-the-loop" configuration when needed.

### Final Thoughts

SRE.ai is positioned to leverage the burgeoning demand for low-code solutions by enhancing the DevOps landscape through AI. By automating tedious processes and ensuring smoother workflows, they are not just keeping pace with technological advancements—they’re setting the standard for what’s possible in the developer tools arena. If you’re in the low-code space looking to elevate your operations, SRE.ai is definitely a name to watch.
